results.title: Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report
results.text_hl: Based on other identified risk factors, including high BMI, @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@, primary @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, and @DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@HZ@@@, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was advised to continue with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 20 mg daily, prescribed @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 80 mg daily, and was educated about maintaining a healthy diet, exercise, and receiving the shingles vaccination.

citations.NLM: Kolesova MV, Minor S. Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e43906. PMID: 37638270
citations.BibTeX: @article{37638270, title={Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report}, author={Kolesova MV and Minor S}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={8}, pages={e43906}}

results.title: [Lisinopril, Amlodipine, Rosuvastatin as a Novel Fixed Combination in the Fight Against Cardiovascular Disease].
results.text_hl: The fixed combination of @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ with ACE inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ allows to control effectively two main cardiovascular risk factors: @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ and arterial @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Semenova AE, Sergienko IV. [Lisinopril, Amlodipine, Rosuvastatin as a Novel Fixed Combination in the Fight Against Cardiovascular Disease]. Kardiologiia. 2017 Oct;57(10):73-79. PMID: 29276932
citations.BibTeX: @article{29276932, title={[Lisinopril, Amlodipine, Rosuvastatin as a Novel Fixed Combination in the Fight Against Cardiovascular Disease].}, author={Semenova AE and Sergienko IV}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={57}, number={10}, pages={73-79}}

results.title: Safety and effectiveness of combined antihypertensive and cholesterol-lowering therapy in high-/very high-risk patients.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@PATIENTS@@@ & METHODS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with mild/moderate @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, at high-/very high-CV risk, received @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-@CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (10/5, 20/5 or 20/10 mg/day) plus @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (10 or 20 mg/day).

citations.NLM: Kónyi A, Sárszegi Z, Hild G, Gaszner B. Safety and effectiveness of combined antihypertensive and cholesterol-lowering therapy in high-/very high-risk patients. J Comp Eff Res. 2016 Jul;5(4):355-64. PMID: 27295112
citations.BibTeX: @article{27295112, title={Safety and effectiveness of combined antihypertensive and cholesterol-lowering therapy in high-/very high-risk patients.}, author={Kónyi A and Sárszegi Z and Hild G and Gaszner B}, journal={J Comp Eff Res}, volume={5}, number={4}, pages={355-64}}

results.title: Fat redistribution and adipocyte transformation in uninephrectomized rats.
results.text_hl: Uninephrectomized @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ developed @DISEASE_Embolism_Fat @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat@@@ redistribution and @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ typical of @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@chronic renal failure@@@ when compared with sham-operated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-treated uninephrectomized @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhao HL, Sui Y, Guan J, He L, Zhu X, Fan RR, Xu G, Kong AP, Ho CS, Lai FM, Rowlands DK, Chan JC, Tong PC. Fat redistribution and adipocyte transformation in uninephrectomized rats. Kidney Int. 2008 Aug;74(4):467-77. PMID: 18496513
